description: Using short, easy-to-digest video lectures, this course will improve your fiction writing skills beyond the ordinary. Beginners and advanced writers alike will benefit from this study of theme, including what it is, why it is important, and how to use it. This course will go over everything you need to know about theme, and I will also show you exactly how to use it step-by-step. If you feel like your fiction is lacking fire, or end up not knowing what to write, then this is the course for you. Take control of your writing skills with this course, and find out what you can do to improve your novels!
title: Creative Writing Novel Workshop - Success with Theme
